definition: (old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: The secret, Palumbi said, may be that the high temperatures last for a short period of time.
sentences.chinese: 帕盧比說，奧祕可能在於高溫只持續了很短一段時間。

sentences.english: Jwasal Malik is one question away from winning 20 million rupees. How did he do it?
sentences.chinese: 賈馬爾距2千萬盧比僅有一步之遙，他是如何做到的？

sentences.english: Four days after that, the limit was slashed to Rs2,000.
sentences.chinese: 但四天後，該限額被降至2000盧比。

sentences.english: Those who sustained serious injuries will get Rs. 1 Lakh each.
sentences.chinese: 那些身受重傷，將得到每一個盧比萬盧比。

sentences.english: Those who sustained serious injuries will get Rs. 1 Lakh each.
sentences.chinese: 那些身受重傷，將得到每一個盧比萬盧比。

sentences.english: The maximum duty for one premium stick accounts for just Rs 1.
sentences.chinese: 一支優質捲菸的最高稅收僅僅爲1盧比。

sentences.english: The betel farms bring the farmers an earning of rupees 4 lacs an acre.
sentences.chinese: 蔞籐種植田一英畝可以幫農人帶來四十萬盧比的收入。

sentences.english: Rajendra Mitra draws a salary of eight hundred rupees a month.
sentences.chinese: 帕薩德密特拉每月賺八百盧比。

sentences.english: The single rooms are priced at Rs. 500.
Sorry, Chine did not spend any Rupees. They spent US Dollars.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，中國不花盧比，他們用美元。

sentences.english: At last they came to a little river called the Rubicon.
sentences.chinese: 最後，他們來到了一條叫做盧比孔的小河邊。

sentences.english: The highest increase of Rs 27 per kg has been recorded in Thiruvananthapuram.
sentences.chinese: 特里凡得琅市創下了每公斤27盧比的最高漲幅。

sentences.english: The Indian rupee has appreciated about 4 percent against the dollar so far this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年以來印度盧比兌美元已升值了約4%。

sentences.english: Fresh from the super success of"3 Idiots", Aamir has reportedly landed aRs.
sentences.chinese: 從“三白癡超級成功鮮”，阿米爾據報道降落盧比。

definition: to ask a price/to charge/asking price
(computing) transcoding/to convert (from one encoding to another)
